sentences.en: All those around him looked at him with amazement.
sentences.cn: 周围的人都对他投射出惊异的眼光.

sentences.en: All three men were looking at ham with amazement.
sentences.cn: 那三人都以惊奇的神态望着他.

sentences.en: He looked at me in blank amazement.
sentences.cn: 他带着迷茫惊诧的神情望着我.

sentences.en: He survived, to the amazement of surgeons.
sentences.cn: 令外科医生惊讶的是，他竟活下来了。

sentences.en: Hung - chien pressed Hsin - mei's shoulder in amazement and asked him why.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 骇异得按着 辛楣 肩膀,问他缘故.

sentences.en: I felt a mixture of amazement and repulsion.
sentences.cn: 我感到惊愕并混杂着反感。

sentences.en: I stared at her in amazement.
I was expressing some amazement and wonder at her good fortune.
sentences.cn: 我对她的好运既惊奇又感叹。

sentences.en: Imagine my amazement when a 70 - year - old man beat me at tennis.
sentences.cn: 在网球赛中,我竟被一位70高龄的老人击败,请想像一下我当时的惊愕状态.

sentences.en: She gazed at him in amazement.
She stared at him in wide-eyed amazement.
sentences.cn: 她睁大眼睛惊讶地注视着他。

sentences.en: They stopped in their tracks and stared at him in amazement.
sentences.cn: 他们突然停下，惊讶地盯着他。

sentences.en: They were filled with elation and amazement for the results.
sentences.cn: 他们对这个结果是惊喜交集.

sentences.en: When we drove through the gates, she wore a look of amazement.
sentences.cn: 我们驶过大门时，她流露出惊讶的神情。

words.tran_cn: 使…吃惊；把…弄糊涂（amaze的过去分词）
